mapper.insert: insert into users (id, username, password, nickname, role, borrowed, status, balance) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrowed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update users set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borrowed = #{borrowed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, nickname, role, borrowed, status, balance from users
